notes::
Aluminum is great for countering allomancy: it is inert and unable to be affected by physical allomancy (push/pull) and can help stop emotional allomancy (such as Rioting). Though aluminum was a highly sought after resource, recent advancements into electrolysis have increased aluminum production (and made Wayne a very rich man). It has been used defensively to counteract allomancers but also offensively to negate defensive abilities.

In reality, aluminum is a versatile metal used for several reasons, such as being lightweight, ductile, resistant, non-magnetic, and sturdy.

I should note that as allomancy is one of the three manifestations of investiture, this should imply that aluminum is a resistor of investiture. For reasons unknown, it does store Identity, allowing for the usage of metalminds (notably Bands of Mourning) by anyone.
